name: CALIFORNIA SPECIAL DISTRICTS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Support for "Special Districts Provide Essential Services Act." Advocacy to increase awareness and knowledge of special districts by covered officials.

Supporting HR 7073, the "Special Districts Provide Essential Services Act", to amend Section 601 of the Social Security Act to define "special district", require states to direct no less than 5 percen
